titleStmt.title: Opusculum plane divinum de mortuorum resurrectione et extremo iuditio, in quatuor linguis succincte conscriptum. Authore Ioanne Clerco. Latyne. Englysshe. Italian. Frenche
titleStmt.author: Clerk, John, d. 1552.

publicationStmt.publisher: In Aldersgate strete by Ioannes Herforde,

notesStmt.note: Text in Latin, English, Italian and French in parallel columns.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
